thread.title: BRIEF-SambaNova Systems Secures $56 Mln In Funding Led By Walden International & GV

title: BRIEF-SambaNova Systems Secures $56 Mln In Funding Led By Walden International & GV
text: March 15, 2018 / 3:11 PM / Updated 3 minutes ago BRIEF-SambaNova Systems Secures $56 Mln In Funding Led By Walden International & GV Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 15 (Reuters) - SambaNova Systems: * SAMBANOVA SYSTEMS EMERGES FROM STEALTH AND SECURES $56 MILLION IN SERIES A FUNDING LED BY WALDEN INTERNATIONAL AND GV * SAMBANOVA SYSTEMS, A STARTUP DEVELOPING COMPUTING PLATFORMS, SAYS CEO OF CADENCE DESIGN SYSTEMS, LIP-BU TAN, WILL ASSUME CHAIRMAN ROLE FOR CO’S BOARD Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
